text: aur tum apane dharm ke anuyaayiyon ke atirikt kisee par vishvaas na karo. kah do, vaastavik maargadarshan to allaah ka maargadarshan hai - ki kaheen jo cheez tumhen praapt ho jae, ya ve tumhaare rab ke saamane tumhaare khilaaf hujjat kar saken." kah do, "badh-chadhakar pradaan karana to allaah ke haath mein hai, jise chaahata hai pradaan karata hai. aur allaah badee samaeevaala, sab kuchh jaananevaala hai
